data.title: Webinar „Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia“
data.meta_description: Keeps lasting memory of the annihilation of Lidice, which was razed to the ground by the German Nazi, June 10, 1942.
data.text:
Get acquainted with the daily life of the inhabitants of the Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia through the webinar.

The webinar presents the circumstances of the establishment of the Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia to the participants. It introduces the top politicians of the Protectorate and acquaints with the life of the inhabitants in this difficult time-period.

A student will gain a brief overview about, how the daily life changed towards people after the implementation of various ordinances, regulations and ubiquitously fear. He will get acquainted the terms as e.g. total deployment, food stamps or time of the darkness.

The webinar will be accompanied by a lecturer.

The webinar is identified for pupils of the second degree of primary schools and for students of secondary schools.

Duration: 45 minutes

Price: 60 CZK / 1 student
